* D simply crouched there and watched Fenox, his attention ocasionally 
grasped by other transformers from time to time. But sooner or later he 
looked back towards the female, finding that he wasn't so nervouse around 
her as of if he was just left alone.
D slowly uncurled from his ball so that he was standing on all fours like 
some giant wolf, his back reaching the height of Fenox's optics.
He was no small beast!
But, he kept close to Fenox all the same. Besides, she was the only familiar 
part of this world he knew of at the moment.
D swung his head around so that he was nearly looking Fenox in the face, 
catching her words and understanding them perfectly.
Earth? Is that where he was? This place was called that?
He looked at the fembot in a puzzled way.*

" E-a-r-t-h?"

* It sounded clumsy but he still mannaged to say what he had heard her call 
this place.
D failed, however, to catch the remainder of the sentance, about the war he 
just happened to drop in on. Though he really didn't care, he was just on a 
world of wonders and was eager to learn.*
